workflow.name: AI-Powered Lead Qualification & Routing with OpenAI, Slack, and Airtable
workflow.description:
# **AI Lead Qualifier & Router**

An intelligent lead management system that automatically captures incoming leads via webhook, uses AI to analyze and score each prospect, then routes them to the appropriate team or campaign based on qualification score‚Äîdelivering hot leads to sales instantly while nurturing others on autopilot.

## **What It Does**

This workflow eliminates the manual process of:

‚Ä¢ Daily lead review and qualification
‚Ä¢ Manual scoring and prioritization
‚Ä¢ Lead assignment and routing decisions
‚Ä¢ Follow-up email composition
‚Ä¢ CRM data entry and updates
‚Ä¢ Sales team notifications for hot prospects

Instead, it delivers **qualified, routed leads with AI insights in under 30 seconds**‚Äîcomplete with structured scoring, personalized responses, and organized data storage for tracking.

## **Key Features**

‚Ä¢ **Webhook Lead Capture** - Accepts leads from any source (forms, landing pages, APIs)
‚Ä¢ **AI-Powered Qualification** - Analyzes budget, timeline, message quality, and fit using OpenAI
‚Ä¢ **Structured Scoring** - Generates 0-100 scores with reasoning, strengths, and concerns
‚Ä¢ **Intelligent Routing** - Automatically directs hot leads (70+) to sales, others to nurture
‚Ä¢ **Instant Notifications** - Slack alerts for high-priority prospects with full context
‚Ä¢ **Dual Email Flows** - Personalized responses based on lead quality and urgency
‚Ä¢ **Airtable Storage** - Organized tracking with qualification data and timestamps

parameters.subject: Thank you for your inquiry - We'll be in touch soon!

parameters.content:
## üéØ Lead Intake
Captures leads from any source:
- Website forms
- Landing pages
- API integrations
- Manual entry tools

## üîÄ Intelligent Routing
Automatic lead distribution:
- Hot Leads (70+) ‚Üí Sales Team
- Warm/Cold ‚Üí Nurture Campaign
### No manual sorting needed!

## üíæ Data & Notifications
Automatic actions:
- Save to Airtable
- Slack alerts for hot leads
- Personalized email responses
- CRM updates (ready to add)

#   
## ü§ñ AI-Powered Qualification
OpenAI analyzes each lead for:
- Budget fit
- Timeline urgency
- Project complexity
- Quality indicators
### Outputs structured score + insights

# **AI Lead Qualifier & Router**

An intelligent lead management system that automatically captures incoming leads via webhook, uses AI to analyze and score each prospect, then routes them to the appropriate team or campaign based on qualification score‚Äîdelivering hot leads to sales instantly while nurturing others on autopilot.

## **What It Does**

This workflow eliminates the manual process of:

‚Ä¢ Daily lead review and qualification
‚Ä¢ Manual scoring and prioritization
‚Ä¢ Lead assignment and routing decisions
‚Ä¢ Follow-up email composition
‚Ä¢ CRM data entry and updates
‚Ä¢ Sales team notifications for hot prospects

Instead, it delivers **qualified, routed leads with AI insights in under 30 seconds**‚Äîcomplete with structured scoring, personalized responses, and organized data storage for tracking.

## **Key Features**

‚Ä¢ **Webhook Lead Capture** - Accepts leads from any source (forms, landing pages, APIs)
‚Ä¢ **AI-Powered Qualification** - Analyzes budget, timeline, message quality, and fit using OpenAI
‚Ä¢ **Structured Scoring** - Generates 0-100 scores with reasoning, strengths, and concerns
‚Ä¢ **Intelligent Routing** - Automatically directs hot leads (70+) to sales, others to nurture
‚Ä¢ **Instant Notifications** - Slack alerts for high-priority prospects with full context
‚Ä¢ **Dual Email Flows** - Personalized responses based on lead quality and urgency
‚Ä¢ **Airtable Storage** - Organized tracking with qualification data and timestamps

## **Who It's For**

Marketing agencies, SaaS companies, and service businesses that need to process high volumes of inbound leads efficiently‚Äîwithout sacrificing lead quality or response time. Perfect for teams tired of manual qualification bottlenecks.

## **Time Saved**

From **5+ minutes of manual review per lead** ‚Üí **automated processing in 20-30 seconds** per lead.

## **Workflow Breakdown**

**Capture ‚Üí Enrich ‚Üí Qualify ‚Üí Route ‚Üí Store & Notify**

Each stage runs automatically, analyzing leads with AI and delivering organized results to your sales team via Slack and Airtable, with zero manual intervention required.

---

## **üîß SETUP INSTRUCTIONS**

### **Required Credentials:**

1. **OpenAI API** - For AI-powered lead qualification
2. **Airtable** - For lead storage and tracking database
3. **Slack** - For real-time team notifications
4. **Email Service** - For automated confirmation/nurture emails (SMTP or provider)

### **Configuration Steps:**

1. Replace `YOUR_AIRTABLE_BASE_ID` and `YOUR_AIRTABLE_TABLE_ID` in both Airtable nodes
2. Configure Airtable field mapping to match your base structure
3. Set up Slack channel and message formatting in "Alert Team" node
4. Update email addresses in both email nodes (`leads@youragency.com`)
5. Customize AI qualification prompt based on your business criteria
6. Adjust qualification threshold (currently 70+) in "Route by Quality" node
7. Test with a single lead before enabling webhook publicly

### **Alternative Approaches:**

‚Ä¢ Can use HubSpot or Salesforce instead of Airtable for CRM integration
‚Ä¢ Can use Microsoft Teams instead of Slack for notifications
‚Ä¢ Can add SMS alerts for ultra-hot leads using Twilio
‚Ä¢ Can implement multi-tier routing (hot/warm/cold) with additional IF nodes
‚Ä¢ Can add calendar booking links for hot leads automatically

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
